mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.acc_id AS "accId", a.node_id AS "nodeId", a.node_name AS "nodeName", a.step_seq AS "stepSeq"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO z_process_step( id, create_by, update_by, del_flag, create_date, update_date, remarks, acc_id, node_id, node_name, step_seq ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{accId}, #{nodeId}, #{nodeName}, #{stepSeq} )
